job.description: stronguCompany DescriptionbrbrustrongstrongProximate Technologies Incstrong is in staffing and consulting since 2004 we are immensely successful in creating a global network of highly adopt intelligent workforce that can help you achieve critical projects and goals Keeping pace with projects and being on the lookout for the extremely talented individuals has become even more challenging and here is where Proximate comes in to playbrbrWe have been providing top consulting services and we are one of the fastest growing IT Consulting Firm in this complex job market with cuttingedge technologies in project implementing services and client recruitment capabilities Our vision is to support services needs of our clients and offer them technologydriven business solutions that meet their goals and corporate objectivesbrbrstronguJob DescriptionbrustrongulliDesign and analyze experiments to verify product hypothesis and directionliliAudit quality of launch experiment results and guarantee correct measurement of product or technical changesapos impactliliKeep track of core metrics and attribute metrics changes to root causesliliAnalyze market dynamics potential gain and cost of new product initiatives and consult on product strategyliliUse data and experiment to verify hypothesis around bottlenecks in product growth and consult on direction for improvementliliWork with engineers and product stakeholders to deliver product insightsliul QualificationsbrulliMaster degree in Computer Science  Electrical Engineering and Information TechnologyliliExpertise in SQL and programming in Python or RliliKnowledge in basic machine learning and deep learningliliStrong communication and teamwork skillsbrliulAdditional InformationbrbrAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines
